name: 林煜善
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week	Dates	Contents	Quiz(Fri.) & Exam
W1.	Feb 19-25	Unit 7: Time to Celebrate	
W2.	Feb 26 - Mar 4	Unit 7: Time to Celebrate	
W3.	Mar 5 - 11	Unit 8: A Fine Art	Quiz 1: Unit 7
W4.	Mar 12 - 18	Unit 8: A Fine Art	
W5.	Mar 19 - 25	Unit 9: Tune In	Quiz 2: Unit 8
W6.	Mar 26 - Apr 1	Unit 9: Tune In	
W7.	Apr 2 - 8	Oral PresentationⅠ& Peer Evaluation	
W8.	Apr 9 - 15	In-class Midterm	Midterm
W9.	Apr 16 - 22	English Proficiency Exam	EPE
W10.	Apr 23 - 29	Unit 10: Study Abroad	Quiz 3: Unit 9
W11.	Apr 30 - May 6	Unit 10: Study Abroad	
W12.	May 7 - 13	Unit 11: Technology and You	Quiz 4: Unit 10
W13.	May 14 - 20	Unit 11: Technology and You	
W14.	May 21 - 27	Unit 12: Your Career Starts Now	Quiz 5: Unit 11
W15.	May 28 - Jun 3	Unit 12: Your Career Starts Now	
W16.	Jun 4 - 10	Oral PresentationⅡ& Peer Evaluation	Quiz 6: Unit 12
W17.	Jun 11 - 17	In-class Midterm	Final
W18.	Jun 18 - 24	English Proficiency Exam	EPE
scorePolicy:
In-class Midterm Exam: 10%
In-class Final Exam: 10%
English Proficiency Exams (EPE): 15% + 15%
Oral Presentation: 10%
Peer Evaluation: 5%
Quizzes (6): 15%
Class Attendance (10): 20%  
*Bonus: Full attendance  You can choose top 3 higher scores.
